DOC.brief_summary: Feasibility of an newly programmed offline application for smartphones (SPA, APP) for colonoscopy preparation offering a 5 day guidance prior colonoscopy containing dietary- and behavioral recommendation.
DOC.brief_title: Improvement of Colonoscopy Preparation by New Media (APP)
DOC.detailed_description: First feasibility testing of a newly programmed app/SPA for android system named Colopr-APP. It is an strictly offline working, autonomous system downloaded to the smartphone. It creates an 5-day guidance prior outpatient colonoscopy with dietary and behavior recommendations.
DOC.criteria: outpatient colonoscopy smartphone owner with android system chronic renal failure anticoagulants pregnancy diabetes mellitus (IDDM)
